EmailTemplate.name: Send Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar] Small Business Banking: Time to Sink or Swim
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Small Business Banking: Time to Sink or Swim <[[https://cba.elevate.commpartners.com/p/201119]]> Thursday, November 19 at 2 p.m. EST Free with code ncr1119
Only 32% of businesses said their primary FI is helping them stay afloat in the pandemic.
One problem? FIs aren't providing them with the banking solutions small businesses need to survive, risking your relationships.
Don’t lose your profitable SMB clients.
Join as Ron Shevlin of Cornerstone Advisors and Forbes Snarktank joins NCR's Doug Brown and Erica Pilon to discuss the critical business banking solutions your FI must offer. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
